'''Gathering of Gourmets''' is an outdoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Beidou]], [[Xiangling]], [[Ganyu]], [[Xinyan]], [[Tartaglia]], and [[Yelan]].

It is obtained from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
